item.content:encoded:
Elite Crypto Consulting offers personal coaching to help you navigate the complex world of cryptocurrency investing.
On Friday, February 8, Bitcoin gained 7.8 percent, signaling another breakout for this famous cryptocurrency. There is significant evidence that other cryptos are set up nicely for a possible run up as well. How does an investor remain objective about balancing his or her investment portfolio? Elite Crypto Consulting discusses the value of portfolio management.

What is portfolio management?

Portfolio management is the operation of making decisions about investment strategy. It takes into account weighing potential investment growth against potential risks. Portfolio management is both an art and a science. It is all about matching investments to objectives and balancing performance against risk.

The key elements of portfolio management are asset allocation and diversification.

  • Asset allocation: Combining a variety of assets, such as stocks, bonds, and cash is said to reduce risk in the long term. As some investments outperform others, the different categories of assets provides a greater potential for returns.
  • Diversification: Since it is impossible to consistently predict which investments will gain and which will lose, the best approach is to diversify. Mixing a wide variety of investments is thought to pose a lesser risk and in turn yield higher returns.

item.content:encoded:
Elite Crypto Consulting can help you get started in cryptocurrency with the exchange, wallet, and cryptocurrencies that are right for you.
So, you’ve done some research on investing in cryptocurrency, your interest is piqued, and you’re now wondering how to get started. Elite Crypto Consulting outlines the first steps for investing in cryptocurrencies.

You’ll need two things to start investing in cryptocurrency:

1) An exchange
An exchange is where you convert your national currency, like the US dollar, into cryptocurrency. Think of it like the stock exchange. At the New York Stock Exchange, cash is converted into stocks (shares of ownership in various publicly-owned corporations).

2) A wallet
A wallet is where you store the cryptocurrency you’ve purchased with your national currency.

Hardware wallets

  • A hardware wallet is a physical storage device created for holding crypto for the long term. Think of it as a vault. While a hardware wallet is highly secure, it is not the best solution for people who are active traders, because it can take hours or even days to retrieve crypto from them.

item.content:encoded:
Elite Crypto Consulting is your source for cryptocurrency information and portfolio management.
An internet search produced this definition of cryptocurrency: “a digital currency in which encryption techniques are used to regulate the generation of units of currency and verify the transfer of funds, operating independently of a central bank.” That definition alone probably best explains why you should hire the professionals at Elite Crypto Consulting to introduce you to this complex form of currency.

While most Americans are not intimately familiar with cryptocurrencies, Bitcoin has managed to make a substantial name for itself following its dynamic performance history, making it the most popular among the various currencies. And for all the buzz in the financial world, there is a very small percentage of investors who have actually purchased cryptocurrencies.

A recent survey attempted to discover the primary reasons American investors were not purchasing more Bitcoin and its crypto cousins, Bitcoin cash, Ethereum, Stellar Lumens, Ripple and Cardano. The three most common explanations for not investing in crypto were given as: no interest or need, too risky of an investment, and too complicated.

Of those who have purchased cryptocurrency, the majority did so after having done their own research rather than rely on each currency’s social media influence. Among those professing to own cryptocurrencies, millennials are at the top, followed by Gen Xers and last, but not least, baby boomers. Of those who plan to purchase crypto in the future, the rankings remain the same.

While many are talking about crypto, many are still very unfamiliar with it.
